ygData.subject: Re: Charm vs. Fear + Chain
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, this will trip you out, kill anything on top of the mountain, basliks, lizard men, cy s, giant skele s, anything non giant up there, and giants will
ygData.messageBody:
Well, this will trip you out, kill anything on top of
the mountain, basliks, lizard men, cy's, giant
skele's, anything non giant up there, and giants will
spawn. Talk about a wide level range of place
holders.

Llewrend Lynnhaven

--- kim@... wrote:
> On Mon, 4 Oct 1999, Llewrend Lynnhaven wrote:
> >
> > Fear and Chain work well on blues and white, but
> not
> > real well on yellows, and almost not at all on
> reds.
>
> It seems to depend on the type of mob. At L34, our
> group had
> two sonic bats dumped on us by someone else. Both
> were red to
> me. I fired up Screech out of reflex, and both bats
> went
> running (flapping?). Our entire party made it out
> alive,
> despite it being the first time in Sol B for two of
> them.
>
> > At level 30 I find one of my favorite pasttimes
> when
> > my friends aren't on is to charm kill hill giants
> in
> > rathe mountains. Very red. And I probably take
> more
> > risks than I need to, mainly due to being lazy.
> >
> > [description snipped]
>
> That's almost exactly what I do. Problem has been
> finding two
> giants.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
>
<HR>




=====
